City of BrasÃ­lia, Brazil's capital.

November 14th, 2022 - 10:00 PM

This woman is saying that they are being boycotted by the electric company in Brasilia.

They just turned off all the lights of the plaza in front of the Military Headquarters.

This woman says that the only tents with power are those with generators, and those tents are very few.

They are not able to move in the dark around the camp.

It is really dark in Brasilia.
